content.raw:
I don't think this should be needed. It's coming from common3-graphics:

~~~
CMake Error at /usr/share/cmake-3.10/Modules/FindPackageHandleStandardArgs.cmake:137 (message):
  Could NOT find FreeImage (missing: FreeImage_FOUND) (Required is at least
  version "3.9")
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  /usr/share/cmake-3.10/Modules/FindPackageHandleStandardArgs.cmake:378 (_FPHSA_FAILURE_MESSAGE)
  /usr/share/cmake/ignition-cmake2/cmake2/FindFreeImage.cmake:95 (find_package_handle_standard_args)
  /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/cmake/ignition-common3-graphics/ignition-common3-graphics-config.cmake:116 (find_package)
~~~

but freeimage is supposed to be a private dependency:

* #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-common/src/357d22cce10e238ce1f257c9be5acb7cfd4a6ed1/CMakeLists.txt?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#CMakeLists.txt-79:81
* #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-common/src/357d22cce10e238ce1f257c9be5acb7cfd4a6ed1/graphics/src/CMakeLists.txt?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#CMakeLists.txt-18:20

this might be a problem with ign-cmake
